summary: In the sixties Romano Amato, his wife Rosa and their two sons Giancarlo and Gigi emigrate from Solino in Italy to Duisburg in the Ruhr area and establish the first Pizza restaurant in town.... See full summary »
cast: Christian Tasche|Barnaby Metschurat|Tiziana Lodato|Antonella Attili|Moritz Bleibtreu|Annika Schmitz|Patrycia Ziolkowska|Nicola Cutrignelli|Michele Ranieri|Cesare Mele|Franco Javarone|Pino Cacace|Giuseppe Fernando Caputo|Rosa Di Brigida|Giuseppe De Rosa|Gigi Savoia|Maria Antonietta Zucano|Dante Marmone|Luigi Santamaria|Francesco Fiannaca|Hermann Lause|Rolf Dennemann|Ralph Misske|Vincent Schiavelli|Sebastiano Toma|Lilian Fritz|Lucas Gregorowicz|Jennifer Koch|Adam Bousdoukos|Dr. Stein|Bastian Trost|Stefan Gebelhoff|Peter Jordan|Markus Hering|Gianluca Milano|Raffaele Milietta|Fabio Frisenda|Andreas Thiel|Alper Akkoc|Michela Millilo|Massimiliano Miccoli|Vito Passeri|Oreste Rotundo|Muhammad Ali|Bianca Nappi
title: Solino
